title: Bollywood Celebrities In Party Mode As Diwali Season Begins And More From Ent

The monochrome pictures shared by Sara shows Ibrahim posing as he flaunts his matching jacket, striped pants, and shoes. Fans flooded these pictures with comments.

Actor Adil Hussain, who has worked in films like English Vinglish and Life of Pi joined the star cast of American web series 'Star Trek: Discovery'. The makers of the series shared the trailer on Twitter a few weeks back in which Adil is seen in a brief role alongside actors Doug Jones, Sonequa Martin-Green, Anthony Rapp, David Ajala, Wilson Cruz, and Michelle Yeoh.

While his wit and charm often make headlines and evoke love from fans on social media, there's much more to Khan that everyone deserves to know about.

The film was a game changer for both Kareena Kapoor and Shahid Kapoor, this classic tale of girl meets boy wasn’t just another rom-com. It was a fun-filled ride with several emotions on the platter. For someone who has spent her entire teenage binge-watching rom-coms and reading Mills & Boons from cover to cover, this movie sure has a special place in my heart for more than one reason. I admit, that Imtiaz Ali’s cinema is not something that i relate to. I never went bonkers over Jordan’s passion neither did i understand fifty shades of VIBGYOR of Ved.
description: n Friday, actor Jackky Bhagnani hosted a house party for his close friends and family. The guest list consisted crème-de-la-crème of Bollywood including Sara Ali Khan, Taapsee Pannu, Shahid Kapoor, Kriti Sanon, Varun Dhawan, Arjun Kapoor, Nushrat Bharucha and others at his house. Actors posed for shutterbugs as they entered the venue.
